item.description:
Cause who doesn't like jewelry!

One of our members will be hosting a Lia Sophia party at her home on 10/23.

Don't miss out on October's fabulous special! Purchase 2 items at the regular price and take your next item (and we want this to be your most expensive item) at HALF off! After that, take up to 3 pairs of earrings OR bracelets at HALF off as well! And, get any of our holiday only items for just $9.95!


Can't make the party? Visit my website at www.liasophia.com/heatherkeep to view the book and place an order on-line with me (Heather Keep...the rep)! It's easy! Just click on the items you are interested in, click on how to order and type in Katherine's name as the hostess. You still get the same incredible special and help out Katherine at the same time!


Sorry to be exclusive...but men of the group, if your wives/girlfriends want to look at the book and see anything they like, you can order as well...the holidays are coming!

Katherine is going to be providing food, but feel free to bring wine or anything else you may want to drink!
item.name: Jewelry Party!
